name: Study Timer
tagline: An open source desktop application for tracking your studying
body:
### Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard - Tim Notke #

Study Timer tracks your study sessions with a session label and a duration. Your study history is saved into a text file to document your time. Will add graphs to visually represent your study time.

Download and run the program: https://goo.gl/8rAXTR
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
